thread.section_title: Mandarin Oriental, Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Memories
thread.title_full: Excellent Memories - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: soyeonk540
title: Excellent Memories
text:
From the greeting from the airport pick up service till check out, our family enjoyed staying at the hotel.
Guest Relations Manager was very attentive and helpful to meet our needs and requests.
Restaurants are all great.
We asked an extra bed which was very confortable, and cleanly ready to sleep.
Kids were excited to have wonderful, eye-catching treats at arrival.
Location also perfect to walk around the heart of Paris.
Overall, we are very happy during the stay.
